html: They shall seek to the idols, and to the charmers, and to them that have familiar spirits, and to the wizards— And thei schul asken their symulacres, and their debynouris, and their devyl clepers, and their devyl sacristers. - Old Bible. The import of the original words has already been given where they occur in the Pentateuch. See Deuteronomy 18:10 , etc.
